alignPoint.description: The pop-up layer follows the mouse position

autoAlignPopupMinWidth.description: Automatically aligns the width of child elements to set the minimum width of the popover
autoAlignPopupMinWidth.description_zh: 自动对齐子元素的宽度设置弹出框的最小宽度

autoAlignPopupWidth.description: Automatically align the width of child elements: Sets the width of the popover
autoAlignPopupWidth.description_zh: 自动对齐子元素的宽度设置弹出框的宽度

autoFitPosition.description: Whether the position of the pop-up box is automatically adjusted based on the space
autoFitPosition.description_zh: 是否根据空间自动调整弹出框的位置

autoFixPosition.description: Automatically relocate when content changes that cause content area dimensions to change.
autoFixPosition.description_zh: 当内容发生变化导致内容区域尺寸发生变化，自动进行重新定位。

blurToHide.description: Whether to close the pop-up box when the trigger node loses focus takes effect only when the trigger contains focus
blurToHide.description_zh: 是否在触发节点失去焦点的时候关闭弹出框，仅在 trigger 中含有 focus 时生效

clickToClose.description: Is it possible to close the pop-up box by clicking on the trigger node? trigger is true by default if it contains click, contextMenu. Otherwise, false
clickToClose.description_zh: 是否能通过点击触发节点来关闭弹出框。trigger 包含 click, contextMenu 时，默认为 true。否则为 false

containerScrollToClose.description: Whether to close the pop-up box when the container is scrolling
containerScrollToClose.description_zh: 是否在容器滚动时关闭弹出框

defaultPopupVisible.description: The default pop-up box is enabled or disabled
defaultPopupVisible.description_zh: 默认弹出框开启或关闭

escToClose.description: Whether to allow pressing the ESC key to close the pop-up box.
escToClose.description_zh: 是否允许按 ESC 键关闭弹出框。

mouseLeaveToClose.description: Whether to disable the pop-up layer when the mouse moves out of the trigger node and pop-up layer
mouseLeaveToClose.description_zh: 是否在鼠标移出触发节点和弹出层的时候关闭弹出层

popupHoverStay.description: Whether to keep the pop-up box when the mouse moves out of the trigger node and into the pop-up box.
popupHoverStay.description_zh: 是否在鼠标移出触发节点，移入弹出框时保留弹出框。

popupVisible.description: Set the pop-up box to be turned on or off
popupVisible.description_zh: 设置弹出框开启或关闭

showArrow.description: Whether or not to display arrow elements

unmountOnExit.description: Whether or not to destroy the DOM structure after hiding
unmountOnExit.description_zh: 隐藏后是否销毁 DOM 结构

updateOnScroll.description: Whether to update the position of the popover box when the container scrolls
updateOnScroll.description_zh: 是否在容器滚动时更新弹出框的位置

:focusDelay.description: The number of milliseconds in which the focus triggers the delay
:focusDelay.description_zh: focus 触发延时的毫秒数

:mouseEnterDelay.description: The number of milliseconds in which mouseenter triggers the delay
:mouseEnterDelay.description_zh: mouseenter 触发延时的毫秒数

:mouseLeaveDelay.description: The number of milliseconds in which mouseleave triggers the delay
:mouseLeaveDelay.description_zh: mouseleave 触发延时的毫秒数

childrenPrefix.description: After setting this parameter, a class named ${childrenPrefix}-open will be added to children when the pop-up is opened.
childrenPrefix.description_zh: 设置这个参数后，打开弹出后，children 上会添加一个名为 ${childrenPrefix}-open 的类。

position.type: / top / tl / tr / bottom / bl / br / left / lt / lb / right / rt / rb
position.description: Pop-up locations, a total of 12 directions to choose from
position.description_zh: 弹出位置，一共有 12 个方位可供选择

:arrowProps.description: All HTML parameters for the arrow element
:arrowProps.description_zh: 箭头元素的所有 html 参数

clickOutsideToClose.description: Whether to close the pop-up layer when you click on an empty space (outside the trigger node and pop-up box). OnVisibleChange is triggered when closed. By default, this logic is triggered during the bubbling phase, and you can set { capture: true } to specify the capture phase to trigger
clickOutsideToClose.description_zh: 是否在点击空白处（触发节点和弹出框以外的区域）时关闭弹出层。 关闭时会触发 onVisibleChange。默认是在冒泡阶段触发该逻辑，可设置 { capture: true } 指定捕获阶段触发

:duration.type: number | { exit?: number; enter?: number; appear?: number }

:popupAlign.type: {left?: number | [number, number];right?: number | [number, number];top?: number | [number, number];bottom?: number | [number, number];}
:popupAlign.description: Adjust the position of the popup, there are four property values, left, right, top, bottom, each representing a few pixels to move in that direction. See the example for details
:popupAlign.description_zh: 调整弹出框的位置，有四个属性值，left, right, top, bottom，分别表示向该方向移动几个像素。具体可查看 示例

:popupStyle.description: The style of the popover box (inside).

:style.description: The style of the popover box (external).

:getDocument.description: Execute clickOutside on that element to trigger the popup box to close
:getDocument.description_zh: 在该元素上执行 clickOutside，触发弹出框关闭

:getPopupContainer.description: Sets the parent element into which the pop-up is inserted
:getPopupContainer.description_zh: 设置弹出内容所插入的父元素

:popup.description: The content of the pop-up box

events.name: onClickOutside
events.description: Click the callback in the area other than the trigger node and pop-up box.
events.description_zh: 点击触发节点和弹出框以外的区域的回调。

events.name: onClick
events.description: Button click event (takes effect when trigger contains click)
events.description_zh: 按钮点击事件（trigger 包含 click 时生效）

events.name: onVisibleChange
events.description: Callbacks that are triggered when you show or hide them
events.description_zh: 显示或隐藏时触发的回调
